title: WaveSpeed AI - Generate Stunning Backgrounds Instantly

hero.heading: Create Stunning Backgrounds
hero.description: Transform your images effortlessly by generating beautiful, customizable backgrounds with a simple prompt.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Create a serene beach scene, generate a bustling city background, design a fantasy landscape...

examples.description: Discover how WaveSpeed AI can elevate your images with stunning background creations.

items.title: Generate Professional Settings

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Leverage cutting-edge technology for breathtaking results that captivate audiences.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Unleash your creativity with real-time background generation, no waiting required.

items.title: User-Friendly Experience
items.description: Simply input your prompt, and our AI does the rest with intuitive controls.

items.title: Your Privacy Matters
items.description: All processing occurs in your browser, ensuring your images remain secure and private.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Quickly create unique backgrounds in three simple steps

items.title: Upload or Select Image
items.description: Choose a photo by dragging and dropping or browsing files. Compatible with JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Background Generation
items.description: Our powerful AI interprets your prompt and generates custom backgrounds, tailored to your vision.

items.title: Download Your Image
items.description: Preview the generated result and download your transformed image in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join a growing community creating stunning visuals with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Roberts
items.comment: The backgrounds generated for my travel photos are absolutely stunning. It’s like magic!

items.name: David Lee
items.comment: I can create unique professional settings for my products in no time. This tool is a must-have!

items.name: Julia Tran

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your common queries about our background generation feature

items.title: What types of backgrounds can be generated?
items.description: You can create a wide variety of backgrounds such as nature scenes, urban landscapes, abstract designs, and much more, catering to any theme or aesthetic.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the background generation feature?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 free credits daily for background generation. Additional credits can be earned through tasks or can be purchased for higher volume needs.

items.title: Can I use the generated backgrounds for commercial projects?
items.description: Absolutely! Users with subscriptions can freely use generated backgrounds for both personal and commercial purposes.

items.title: How does privacy protection work when generating backgrounds?
items.description: All processing occurs locally in your browser using secure technologies. Your images are never uploaded, ensuring total privacy and security.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Backgrounds?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the transformation instantly. No sign-up needed.
